content: Looking for something new to spice up your meal routine? Look no further than our trendy new Butter Chicken Bowl! 🍗🍚 Marinated chicken in a rich butter sauce served on a bed of fluffy rice, perfectly spiced with Indian flavors. Get 10% off your order with code BUTTERBOWL10. Limited time offer, so don't wait! #ButterChicken #FoodieFind
